title: bitbetting
blurb: Non-custodial Bitcoin prediction markets using DLCs and Lightning, with oracle sets, parimutuel pools, and orderbooks.
description: bitbetting is a research stack for sovereign prediction markets on Bitcoin. Create markets from oracle announcements, accept orders via parimutuel pools or limit books, and settle outcomes with Discreet Log Contracts (DLCs) over Lightning or on-chain. Features multi-oracle quorums, fee & edge accounting, dispute windows, watchtowers, and exportable receipts. Goal: minimize custody/oracle risk while keeping UX snappy.
